snippet.title: FREEDIVER: Triton Down | Launch Trailer | Available Now on Oculus and Steam
snippet.description:
FREEDIVER: Triton Down is a submersive VR adventure game available now on Oculus and Steam!

Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/995230
Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2683634734986656/

Plunge into a capsizing research ship, the Triton, where survival means outmaneuvering the water's lethal surge. As world-class diver Ren Tanaka, you must freedive through a sinking ship, overcome underwater chaos, and unlock your path to the surface, all while protecting your most precious resource: the breath in your lungs.

Underwater Adventure
Survive a harrowing nautical disaster as a world-class freediver

Fight for Breath
Oxygen is your only resource, the rising seawater your greatest adversary 

Gestural Locomotion
Navigate virtual spaces with intuitive dive and swim movement

Interactive Puzzles
Stay calm, think fast, and use your environment to escape

Binaural Soundscapes
Handcrafted music and SFX from an award-winning audio team
 
Realism in Unreal
Dive into vivid underwater environments, brought to life in UE4

#DontForgetToBreathe

LEARN MORE
http://www.archiactvr.com/games/freediver-triton-down

FOLLOW ARCHIACT
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArchiactVR
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/archiact
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/archiact/
